author: VIVEK GOPALAKRISHNAN

review: I'm 5 Chromecasts deep and absolutely love these. As someone who cut the cord 6 years ago these have changed my experience with TV. I've used Roku's, Boxee Boxes and WD Live TV devices in the past on my TVs. However, the introduction of a Plex compatible App for Android with Chromecast makes all the other boxes unnecessary. Furthermore, I've wall mounted TVs in places I couldn't with the other devices and have zero problems using my Chromecast on these TVs.This is a game changing device and a must own. One of the TVs I was wall mounting came with a Roku Streaming Stick and when it asked me for my credit card I took the stick and tossed it in favor of a Chromecast. It's really a great device.
